item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc

summoned with #420 Call Ancestor (Conjuration 1), #421 Wrath of the Ancestors (Conjuration 7)

An ancestral spirit is the helpful spirit of an ancestor. It is given offerings to secure the well-being of its descendants. In times of need, ancestral spirits can be called upon to aid armies.
